author: Ben Dummett
title: Qualcomm Set to Raise Bid for NXP to $44 Billion
text:
Qualcomm Inc. pumped new life into its bid for NXP Semiconductors NV, raising its offer to $44 billion and locking up support from key stakeholdersâ€”a move Broadcom Ltd. previously has threatened could cause it to abandon its $121 billion pursuit of Qualcomm.
The elevated price for NXP, announced Tuesday, is the latest twist in months of maneuvering between Qualcomm and Broadcom for an advantage in what would be the largest tech deal ever.
...
